projects.name: Api Challange
projects.desc: A Challange as presented by Elevenfifty Academy to use an open api with a key.  I choose a music api and made it so you can enter an artist to get a list of songs or enter a song and artist to get the lyrics

projects.name: Shopping List
projects.desc: A basic agile application that stores a list locally with two views.  Uses the MVC model

projects.name: Javascript Library
projects.desc: A repo of all my work durning the Javascript cohort of Elevenfifty Academy.  Personal favorite is the extension.js which I use in almost my projects and provides just some useful features.

projects.name: Github
projects.desc: My personal github page with my projects.

projects.name: Java Chat Moderator Bot
projects.desc: A personal project that will moderate any IRC server.  You can create custom commands via Javascript.  My intended target is streamers with specific features (such as song-requests) tailored to their needs.

projects.name: MERN Bucket List
projects.desc: A simmple react based website where you can store some tasks

projects.name: MEAN stack project
projects.desc: A community page for my twitch liveStream
